code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'../axiosInstance';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeacherList=()=>{const{schoolId}=useParams();const[teachers,setTeachers]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTeachers=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/teacher/school-id/".concat(schoolId));setTeachers(response.data);}catch(error){setError(error);console.error('There was an error fetching the teachers!',error);}};fetchTeachers();},[schoolId]);if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error.message]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Teachers for School ID: ",schoolId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:teachers.map(teacher=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:teacher.name},teacher.id))})]});};export default TeacherList;
